meta.description: Determine the number of regular and emergency fire fighters to hire to minimize the total number of fire fighters while meeting time and budget constraints.

sets.name: FIREFIGHTER_TYPES
sets.description: Types of fire fighters employed by the department.

params.name: hours_per_shift
params.description: Hours worked per shift by each type of fire fighter.

params.name: cost_per_shift
params.description: Cost per shift for each type of fire fighter.

params.name: required_hours
params.description: Minimum required hours of fire fighter time.

params.name: budget
params.description: Total budget available for hiring fire fighters.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of shifts to hire for each type of fire fighter.

objective.name: min_total_fire_fighters
objective.description: Minimize the total number of fire fighters hired.

constraints.name: time_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 300 hours of fire fighter time.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total cost does not exceed the budget.
